jkahMQ"></textarea></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div><div><div data-tag="post-card"><div class="sc-ef8b06c8-0"><div class="sc-9628564b-0 dbVxfk"><div class="cm-iFCzpr cm-biDAuW cm-SXSTSm cm-DAbLap"><div class="sc-4221c731-0"><div class="sc-4221c731-1 hlTBMb"><div class="sc-a7ca7965-4 iftDkb"><div class="sc-a7ca7965-8 cdEFwZ"><div class="gallery-grid-item"><div class="sc-507b496e-0 iCQuhJ image-grid"><img src="https://c10.patreonusercontent.com/4/patreon-media/p/post/96676417/dbd7ff1e76a94c51b98f4609aa18a131/eyJ3IjoxMDgwfQ%3D%3D/1.jpg?token-hash=kb-nqBeNdgtISYXNqi7-M9RPXjKuPcDddDydCsrWs9I%3D&amp;token-time=1757203200" loading="lazy" class="sc-507b496e-2 gmdBUQ"></div></div></div><div class="sc-a7ca7965-3 gHhHrs"></div></div></div><div class="cm-lPflDU"><div class="sc-39651d8c-2 hdHuoy"><div><div><div class="cm-imXdeh"><div class="cm-zXnyOS"><div><span class="cm-ialtoT cm-dyHRMA cm-KbsWTM cm-boAtIs cm-iPaVSC cm-ThmtRO cm-GGZhvK cm-bBDjcV cm-bjIYXb" data-tag="post-title"><a href="https://www.patreon.com/posts/new-ambience-96676417">New Ambience: Whiteout</a></span></div></div></div><div class="sc-209d42cd-0 dPQwHY"><div class="cm-VzrHRj cm-dupTbP cm-NAbYEF cm-TOsLDU cm-vMqrUI cm-GGZhvK sc-209d42cd-2 kyefAc"><div class="sc-209d42cd-1 heKzHR"><div class="sc-c3051d5d-0 hJbUuK"><button class="cm-pQxmHn cm-StyNxk cm-VbVCci cm-botCrQ cm-VuJSot cm-isJlgp cm-dupTbP cm-UsNHpA cm-TOsLDU" type="button"><div class="cm-nbFCfZ cm-HvgpSm cm-wfkYWE" data-tag="chip-container"><span class="cm-VzrHRj cm-dupTbP cm-NAbYEF cm-wWrYzV cm-zZoZpN cm-GGZhvK">New</span></div></button></div><span id="track-click"><a href="https://www.patreon.com/posts/new-ambience-96676417" class="cm-pQxmHn cm-StyNxk cm-VbVCci cm-botCrQ cm-VuJSot cm-isJlgp cm-dupTbP cm-NAbYEF cm-TOsLDU" data-tag="post-published-at"><span><span>Jan 17, 2024</span></span></a></span></div></div></div></div><div class="cm-gBCCZY"><div class="sc-6b0897ec-0 hnhBGU"><div class="sc-9628564b-0 iAojJp"><button class="cm-pQxmHn cm-ErDrxA cm-VbVCci cm-botCrQ cm-VuJSot cm-zypTtC cm-dupTbP cm-UsNHpA cm-TOsLDU" type="button" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls=":r30h:">Show more</button></div><div class="sc-827a7d51-0 cJqAbW"><div aria-hidden="false" class="sc-827a7d51-1 gMgVGi"><div id=":r30h:"><div aria-hidden="true"><div class="sc-9628564b-0 copkPe"><div class="cm-zXnyOS"><div class="cm-LIiDtl cm-wHoaYV cm-KArsEf cm-LsBaRW"><div class=""><div class="cm-LIiDtl cm-wHoaYV cm-mhTrbr cm-LsBaRW"><div><p>Greetings Patrons,</p><p>Is it a coincidence that during work on this track, New York City received its first decent snowfall in 701 days? (It was only 1.4")</p><p><em>Whiteout </em>is a POV of a struggle against nature. Brutal headwinds, stinging sleet, deep drifts, and biting cold are your adversaries in this one. It was a challenge to create a chaotic feeling of blindness and disorientation.&nbsp;</p><p>Musically, my plan was for driving rhythms with no real tonal center, and plenty of dissonance. This is tough to maintain over a long period (I tried - it was bad), so I created lulls in the onslaught to coincide with short breaks into tonality.&nbsp;</p><p>The instrumentation is pure orchestral in this one. Strings, brass, woodwinds, and percussion with low strings doing some extra percussive work.</p><p>The ambience is layers of wind, including some mechanically synthesized wind courtesy of a sampled version of an old theater wind machine that spun different-sized cylinders against canvas belts at varying speeds.</p><p>As this is in Patreon-only sneak-peek mode, I've included the mixed version (live on the site next week) as well as music-only, and ambience-only versions. Additionally, I created 2 "No Figure" versions that remove the snowy footsteps and wind-battered cloak sounds.</p><p>The music-only version of this would probably work well for any kind of chaotic situation in which up is down, and down is up. Ambience-wise I think this might even be passable as a desert sandstorm.&nbsp;</p><p>Thank you all, as always, for your continuing support.</p><p>Best,</p><p>Tim</p><p><a href="https://tabletopaudio.com">https://tabletopaudio.com</a>&nbsp;</p><p><br></p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div height="80" opacity="1" class="sc-827a7d51-2 leZcBz"></div></div></div></div><div class="sc-9628564b-0 fOiyPa" data-tag="post-attachments"><span id="track-click"><a href="/file?h=96676417&amp;m=266460646" class="cm-pQxmHn cm-ErDrxA cm-VbVCci cm-GGZhvK"><div>To the last part of your description, yes. The ambience works as a sandstorm! Living in the high desert of Nevada, right up against the Sierra Range, we get winds that gust up to 40-70mph at least twice a year, and the ambience-only version perfectly highlights that chaos!</div></p></div></div><div data-tag="comment-actions" class="sc-6938f163-9 imwKue"><div class="sc-9628564b-0 BsKbD"><div class="sc-6938f163-8 fBebWH"><button class="cm-pQxmHn cm-StyNxk cm-VbVCci class="cm-imXdeh"><div class="cm-zXnyOS"><div><span class="cm-ialtoT cm-dyHRMA cm-KbsWTM cm-boAtIs cm-iPaVSC cm-ThmtRO cm-GGZhvK cm-bBDjcV cm-bjIYXb" data-tag="post-title"><a href="https://www.patreon.com/posts/new-ambience-96234829">New Ambience: The Misty Marsh</a></span></div></div></div><div class="sc-209d42cd-0 dPQwHY"><div class="cm-VzrHRj cm-dupTbP cm-NAbYEF cm-TOsLDU cm-vMqrUI cm-GGZhvK sc-209d42cd-2 kyefAc"><div class="sc-209d42cd-1 heKzHR"><div class="sc-c3051d5d-0 hJbUuK"><button class="cm-pQxmHn cm-StyNxk cm-VbVCci cm-botCrQ cm-VuJSot cm-isJlgp cm-dupTbP cm-UsNHpA cm-TOsLDU" type="button"><div class="cm-nbFCfZ cm-HvgpSm cm-wfkYWE" data-tag="chip-container"><span class="cm-VzrHRj cm-dupTbP cm-NAbYEF cm-wWrYzV cm-zZoZpN cm-GGZhvK">New</span></div></button></div><span id="track-click"><a href="https://www.patreon.com/posts/new-ambience-96234829" class="cm-pQxmHn cm-StyNxk cm-VbVCci cm-botCrQ cm-VuJSot cm-isJlgp cm-dupTbP cm-NAbYEF cm-TOsLDU" data-tag="post-published-at"><span><span>Jan 10, 2024</span></span></a></span></div></div></div></div><div class="cm-gBCCZY"><div class="sc-6b0897ec-0 hnhBGU"><div class="sc-9628564b-0 iAojJp"><button class="cm-pQxmHn cm-ErDrxA cm-VbVCci cm-botCrQ cm-VuJSot cm-zypTtC cm-dupTbP cm-UsNHpA cm-TOsLDU" type="button" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls=":r30o:">Show more</button></div><div class="sc-827a7d51-0 cJqAbW"><div aria-hidden="false" class="sc-827a7d51-1 gMgVGi"><div id=":r30o:"><div aria-hidden="true"><div class="sc-9628564b-0 copkPe"><div class="cm-zXnyOS"><div class="cm-LIiDtl cm-wHoaYV cm-KArsEf cm-LsBaRW"><div class=""><div class="cm-LIiDtl cm-wHoaYV cm-mhTrbr cm-LsBaRW"><div><p>Greeting Patrons,</p><p>I recently watched, and enjoyed the series "The Essex Serpent", but, if I'm being honest, mostly for the beautiful landscapes. I think I scrawled something like 'marsh/boat" in my notebook. I've done some similar natural environments before but they were either more of a wetland nature preserve with lots of wildlife, or featured a skulking monster.&nbsp;</p><p>This is quite a peaceful ambience, with gentle breezes, lapping water, and the rhythmic sounds of oars dipping unhurriedly into the water.</p><p>Musically, this features a lovely droning cello part, played irregularly, in fifths. On top of this, I layered ethereal vocals, some distant metallic plucks, and lazy atmospheric strings. The whole thing was designed to be languid and swirl about, like the wind and the water.</p><p>All this makes for a calm and peaceful track that could either set the stage for something to come, or a place to rest. &nbsp;The music-only version would make a fine ethereal plane track or something similarly mystical.</p><p>This is in Patreon-only sneak-peek mode until next week, so I've included the mixed version of the track, as well as music-only, and ambience-only versions. Additionally, I created a few alternate versions: You'll find mixed and ambience versions that have no-boat and no-boat, no-bugs. This last option is a way to alter the time of day from evening to day. I hope you find these useful.</p><p>Thank you all, as always, for your continuing support.&nbsp;</p><p>Best,</p><p>Tim</p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div height="80" opacity="1" class="sc-827a7d51-2 leZcBz"></div></div></div></div><div class="sc-9628564b-0 fOiyPa" data-tag="post-attachments"><span id="track-click"><a href="/file?h=96234829&amp;m=264176531" class="cm-pQxmHn cm-ErDrxA cm-VbVCci cm-botCrQ cm-VuJSot cm-zypTtC cm-dupTbP cm-UsNHpA cm-TOsLDU" data-tag="post-attachment-link"><span aria-hidden="true" class="cm-KjCHCa cm-rIvVoM cm-AvhsWt"><svg data-tag="IconDocument" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M13.5 6.374V4.5c0-.628.055-1.003.177-1.222.121-.218.309-.279.573-.279.745 0 2.058.827 3.184 1.896C18.56 5.966 19.5 7.278 19.5 8.25c0 .264-.061.452-.28.573-.217.122-.593.177-1.22.177h-1.874c-1.313 0-1.97 0-2.298-.328-.328-.329-.328-.985-.328-2.298M18 10.5h-1.875c-2.062 0-3.094 0-3.61-.516C12 9.47 12 8.438 12 6.375V4.503c0-.743-.006-1.12-.197-1.31-.192-.19-.569-.195-1.311-.19-2.996.018-4.494.152-5.243 1.152C4.5 5.155 4.5 7.02 4.5 10.5v3c0 3.75 0 5.625.938 6.563C6.375 21 8.25 21 12 21c3.75 0 5.625 0 6.563-.937.937-.938.937-2.813.937-6.563V12c0-.74-.005-1.115-.195-1.305-.19-.19-.565-.195-1.305-.195"></path></svg></span>398_The_Misty_Marsh.mp3</a></span><span id="track-click"><a iftDkb"><div class="sc-a7ca7965-8 cdEFwZ"><div class="gallery-grid-item"><div class="sc-507b496e-0 iCQuhJ image-grid"><img class="cm-imXdeh"><div class="cm-zXnyOS"><div><span class="cm-ialtoT cm-dyHRMA cm-KbsWTM cm-boAtIs cm-iPaVSC cm-ThmtRO cm-GGZhvK cm-bBDjcV cm-bjIYXb" data-tag="post-title"><a href="https://www.patreon.com/posts/new-ambience-95796455">New Ambience: Homecoming</a></span></div></div></div><div class="sc-209d42cd-0 dPQwHY"><div class="cm-VzrHRj cm-dupTbP cm-NAbYEF cm-TOsLDU cm-vMqrUI cm-GGZhvK sc-209d42cd-2 kyefAc"><div class="sc-209d42cd-1 heKzHR"><div class="sc-c3051d5d-0 hJbUuK"><button class="cm-pQxmHn cm-StyNxk cm-VbVCci cm-botCrQ cm-VuJSot cm-isJlgp cm-dupTbP cm-UsNHpA cm-TOsLDU" type="button"><div class="cm-nbFCfZ cm-HvgpSm cm-wfkYWE" data-tag="chip-container"><span class="cm-VzrHRj cm-dupTbP cm-NAbYEF cm-wWrYzV cm-zZoZpN cm-GGZhvK">New</span></div></button></div><span id="track-click"><a href="https://www.patreon.com/posts/new-ambience-95796455" class="cm-pQxmHn cm-StyNxk cm-VbVCci cm-botCrQ cm-VuJSot cm-isJlgp cm-dupTbP cm-NAbYEF cm-TOsLDU" data-tag="post-published-at"><span><span>Jan 3, 2024</span></span></a></span></div></div></div></div><div class="cm-gBCCZY"><div class="sc-6b0897ec-0 hnhBGU"><div class="sc-9628564b-0 iAojJp"><button class="cm-pQxmHn cm-ErDrxA cm-VbVCci cm-botCrQ cm-VuJSot cm-zypTtC cm-dupTbP cm-UsNHpA cm-TOsLDU" type="button" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls=":r30v:">Show more</button></div><div class="sc-827a7d51-0 cJqAbW"><div aria-hidden="false" class="sc-827a7d51-1 gMgVGi"><div id=":r30v:"><div aria-hidden="true"><div class="sc-9628564b-0 copkPe"><div class="cm-zXnyOS"><div class="cm-LIiDtl cm-wHoaYV cm-KArsEf cm-LsBaRW"><div class=""><div class="cm-LIiDtl cm-wHoaYV cm-mhTrbr cm-LsBaRW"><div><p>Greetings Patrons,</p><p>A happy 2024 to you all!</p><p>It is so good to be back in NYC after a short holiday away. I think I kid myself when I say I love what I do, and therefore downtime is unnecessary. It really is necessary, and 6 days seems to be the perfect amount of time away from the studio. Anything more and I'll have to figure out a mobile writing/recording solution!</p><p>When I saw the New York skyline on my return, the word 'homecoming' wouldn't leave my head. The way it feels to be back, the way travel is good, but home is home. This idea stayed with me as I was sketching out the new track.&nbsp;</p><p>The ambience was going to be a fantasy city, something with a bit of bustle. Maybe a festival of some kind, or maybe just a reception for the conquering heroes. &nbsp;I created a spacious environment to simulate a central square, placing sounds in the foreground as well as the distance.</p><p>Musically this was going to be as traditional as it gets. The full Howard Shore. String orchestra with woodwinds and brass, minimal percussion, and a sprinkling of magical faerie dust over the top. I think this will find lots of use a general-purpose start/end campaign theme. I'm quite pleased with how it came out and I found some new orchestration ideas along the way, so bonus!&nbsp;</p><p>This is in Patreon-only sneak-peek mode currently, so I've included the mixed version of the track (live on the site next week), as well as music-only, and ambience-only versions. Additionally, I created 2 'fewer people' versions (mixed and ambience) for situations where the location is still a town/city, but without the throngs of people. I hope you find these useful additions.</p><p>Thank you all, as always, for your continuing support.</p><p>Best,</p><p>Tim</p><p><a href="https://tabletopaudio.com">https://tabletopaudio.com</a>&nbsp;</p><p><br></p></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div height="80" opacity="1" class="sc-827a7d51-2 leZcBz"></div></div></div></div><div class="sc-9628564b-0 fOiyPa" data-tag="post-attachments"><span id="track-click"><a href="/file?h=95796455&amp;m=261860255" class="cm-pQxmHn cm-ErDrxA cm-VbVCci Ambience: Fire Dance","content":"\u003cp\u003eGreetings Patrons,\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eThe first hints of autumn are descending on New York City and I do love a bonfire in the cool evenings (not in the city, of course). Which is to say, I was thinking about fires when I created this tribal/pagan/ritual track of a group of revelers around a large fire pit. I was probably also remembering the great \u003cem\u003eKilling Joke\u003c/em\u003e&nbsp;video for their song \u003ca href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GUQhNEyAf0I\" rel=\"nofollow noopener\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eLet's All Go (to the Fire Dances)\u003c/a\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eThere could be many reasons for this dance. A drug-fueled vision quest, a funeral, a pre-battle spirit summoning, or any number of other things people get up to the woods. It could certainly be viking themed, but it doesn't have to be.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eI played lots of acoustic instruments (drums, percussion, tagelharpa, viola, voice) for this, as it felt appropriate, but I also didn't shy from adding modern sound-design elements to push it further. It ended up in a psychedelic place pretty quickly. There's also definitely a nightmare/horror vibe to this. \u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eThe ambience has the fire of course, plus some various torch whooshes and bone charms, as well as a forest/jungle ambience.  Technically I could have put the chanting into the ambience but I thought it made more sense to keep it with the music. \u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eAs this track is in Patreon sneak-peek mode, I've attached the mixed-version, as well as ambience-only, and music-only versions of the track. Additionally, I created 2 'no wildlife' versions which remove some of the distant bird/animal sounds which could make this track work in non arboreal environments or even indoors.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eThank you all, as always, for your continuing support.\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eBest,\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eTim\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003e\u003ca
